A ship suddenly crashes into a forest near Shokaract. (ALot of ship crashes=
 in this RPG) Several bots pour out.  There are 5. The bigger one, who must=
 be the leader signaled his men. Then they all pulled out machine guns and =
pointed them at Shokaract.

"All right, see? We're going to run you through=
, it's coitans for you, crab!" The leader spoke. Shokaract was furious, he =
could have blown these guys up right now! But he was building a team.

"How=
 would your little mob like to join me, I have a good base in the works." S=
hokaract said. The Mafia looked at each other.

"I like you, crab bot, you =
give us a good offer, so we'll let you use our base! See?" Kraken, the lead=
er, pointed at his ship and signaled the rest to lower their weapons. Shoka=
ract was pleased.

"I am the dark god Shokaract, by helping me you will be =
greatly rewarded when I take over the universe."

"Good, good, the Mafia li=
kes that." Another bot said. He was Grenade.

"Well then, I want those bots=
 over there, they will join me or else they will pay!" Shokaract said.

"Ya=
h, I like the part about paying." Beholder said. They went towards the Chos=
en Ones...
